options.result_text: You try to force the door open,@0050w but it won't budge!@0500w
The door stays sturdy,@0050w not giving so much as a rattle.@0500w

The room around you,@0050w like the house outside,@0050w is made of barren plywood.@0500w The only light source is a large frosted-glass window situated in the front door.@0500w There are two large boxes in the right and leftmost corners in front of you.@0500w A big-brimmed hat and a long trench coat hang on a metal hook against the left wall.@0500w There are no other doors or windows.@0500w
You examine the room more closely.@0500w To your surprise,@0050w you find a small wooden trapdoor on the ceiling that you hadn't noticed before.@0500w

options.option_text: Pull a box over to reach the trapdoor

options.result_text: You attempt to smash the window with your fist.@0500w Great job!@0500w Now your hand hurts.@0500w
You attempt to smash the window again.@0500w The pain in your fist makes you want to cry.@0500w
The window again dismisses your hit.@0500w Your knuckles are cracked and bleeding.@0500w
The window has small red stains on its frosted glass.@0500w The cracks on your hand get larger.@0500w
The window has small red streaks on its frosted glass.@0500w The cracks on your hand get larger.@0500w
The almighty window is unamused.@0500w You only achieve further self harm.@0500w

Your hands seem to be moving on their own now.@0500w The only thing you can make out is blood.@0500w Blood everywhere.@0500w Blood on the window.@0500w Blood on the floor.@0500w Blood seeping into your shoes.@0500w Blood dripping down your clothes.@0500w As you get further in,@0050w it only gets more pronounced.@0500w Blood.@0500w Blood.@0500w Blood.@0500w

There is no going back now.@0500w Panic builds in your body as you attempt to stop,@0050w but the more panicked you get,@0050w the harder you pound.@0500w Broken bone sticks out of your knuckles and the tips of your fingers,@0050w pulling nerves and blood vessels up along with it.@0500w Chunks of your hands begin to fall on the floor.@0500w Slowly but surely,@0050w the gashes turn to missing fingers,@0050w blown holes,@0050w and pulverized bits of bone,@0050w all of which fall to the floor.@0500w You feel yourself become weaker,@0050w your face getting cold as blood leaks out of you like a fountain.@0500w You fall backward and land with the thud of wood.@0500w@0080d Your ears let out a high-pitched ring as you see and feel everything@0115d steadily fade@0600w to black.@0500w

You examine the hat and coat against the left wall.@0500w The hat is made of fine leather,@0050w the coat of breathable black silk.@0500w Upon closer inspection,@0050w they both look incredibly old and tattered.@0500w The silk especially looks very,@0050w very dirty.@0500w Deep slash marks cover the surface of the two objects,@0050w as if someone cut into them repeatedly with a knife.@0500w You take a closer inspection and-@0050w woah.@0500w Woah.@0500w Woah!@0500w Inside the hat,@0050w cleverly covered by the angle of the hat,@0030w is a human skull,@0030w with lidless,@0025w bloodshot eyes staring back out at you.@0500w You instinctively jump back as it unhooks itself from the sharp metal hook.@0500w The ground shakes as it hits the ground.@0500w You hear a sharp clicking sound and see a large black hole growing around the front door.@0500w The skeleton draws its sword and slashes!@0500w What do you do?

options.hatchet: You open the left box to find a hatchet with a wooden handle and an unpolished head.@0500w Suddenly,@0050w you hear a sharp clicking sound.@0500w A large black hole is forming around the front door!@0500w The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside!@0500w You jump back instinctively as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes!@0500w What do you do?@0500w
options.dagger: You open the left box to find a small dagger with ornate engravings on the blade and hilt with a medium ruby on either side of said hilt.@0500w Suddenly,@0050w you hear a sharp clicking sound.@0500w A large black hole is forming around the front door!@0500w The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside!@0500w You jump back instinctively as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes!@0500w What do you do?@0500w
options.nightstick: You open the left box to find a collapsable nightstick made of heavy metal and painted a sleek black.@0500w Suddenly,@0050w you hear a sharp clicking sound.@0500w A large black hole is forming around the front door!@0500w The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside!@0500w You jump back instinctively as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes!@0500w What do you do?@0500w
options.spider: You open the left box and find a large tarantula inside that hisses and lunges!@0500w You instinctively duck,@0050w just barely preventing the arachnid from landing on you.@0500w Suddenly,@0050w you hear a sharp clicking sound.@0500w A large black hole is forming around the front door!@0500w The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside!@0500w You jump back instinctively as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes!@0500w What do you do?@0500w
options.head: You open the left box to find a severed head staring up at you.@0500w It moves two glazed eyes in your direction and screams!@0500w The painful sound brings you to your knees,@0050w hands over your ears,@0050w as you feel something large hit the ground.@0500w You turn to look,@0050w and the hat and coat have sprung to life,@0050w with a skeleton inside!@0500w It draws a sword and slashes!@0500w What do you do?@0500w
options.empty: You open the left box to find nothing inside.@0500w Suddenly,@0050w you hear a sharp clicking sound.@0500w A large black hole is forming around the front door!@0500w The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside!@0500w You jump back instinctively as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes!@0500w What do you do?@0500w

options.hatchet: You open the right box to find a hatchet with a wooden handle and an unpolished head,@0050w which you promptly pick up.@0500w Suddenly,@0050w you hear a sharp clicking sound.@0500w A large black hole is forming around the front door!@0500w The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside!@0500w You press yourself against the wall as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes!@0500w What do you do?@0500w

options.head: You open the right box to find a severed head staring up at you.@0500w It moves two glazed eyes in your direction and screams!@0500w The painful sound brings you to your knees,@0050w hands over your ears,@0050w as you feel something large hit the ground.@0500w You turn to look,@0050w and the hat and coat have sprung to life,@0050w with a skeleton inside!@0500w It draws a sword and slashes!@0500w What do you do?@0500w
options.empty: You open the right box to find nothing inside.@0500w Suddenly,@0050w you hear a sharp clicking sound.@0500w A large black hole is forming around the front door!@0500w The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside!@0500w You press yourself against the wall as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes!@0500w What do you do?@0500w

options.result_text: Contrary to the barren plywood room,@0050w the door itself has been painted a muted white,@0050w with a darkened metallic handle.@0500w Both look brand new.@0500w In addition,@0050w a large frosted window sits just within your reach.@0500w
You sit on the floor and cry.@0500w Feels good.@0500w
